categories.name: KUKA
categories.description: Utilized C# and .NET to create a tool that can organize, query, and create testing notes, allowing employees to quickly find information about past projects and efficiently create new notes. The software increased productivity for our department, and its flexible design allowed for quick changes to be adapted by another department.

categories.name: Other Jobs
categories.description: I have taught music for 8 years, first as a piano teacher for young students at Music Stadium, then as a music theory tutor at Oakland University starting in September 2022. These positions have required me to communicate complex ideas to students, and to assume a leadership role to inspire students and keep them engaged.
